actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in Senate.

official_title: A resolution to authorize the Senate Legal Counsel to appear as amicus curiae in the name of the Subcommittee on Improvements in Judicial Machinery of the Committee on the Judiciary in obtaining the release of documents from the Department of Justice.

summary.text: Authorizes the Senate Legal Counsel, pursuant to the Ethics in Government Act of 1978, to appear as amicus curiae in the name of the Subcommittee on Improvement in the Judiciary in support of the release of certain documents by the Department of Justice.

titles.title: A resolution to authorize the Senate Legal Counsel to appear as amicus curiae in the name of the Subcommittee on Improvements in Judicial Machinery of the Committee on the Judiciary in obtaining the release of documents from the Department of Justice.
